name: Cat Lick Mat (Slow Feeder)
imageAlt: Textured silicone cat lick mat with suction cups for slow feeding enrichment
shortDescription: Slow down mealtime and reduce anxiety with this enrichment lick mat for cats.
description: Licking is a naturally calming behaviour for cats, and this textured mat turns treat time into a soothing enrichment activity. Spread wet food, yoghurt, or puree across the surface and watch your cat enjoy a longer, more satisfying meal. Great for keeping anxious cats calm during thunderstorms or vet visits.
features: Food-grade silicone with multiple textured zones for varied licking
Strong suction cups stick securely to floors, walls, or tubs
Helps reduce anxiety, boredom, and fast eating
